effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user’s body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
